attributes.action: Send Home Asylum Seekers That Commit Crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we must offer hospitality to these people, why should they be allowed to commit crimes against the people of this country, such as rapes, murders, and robberies. If they want to make a joke of the law, send them back to where they came from, and let them murder someone in their own country. We wouldn't get away with it in their country, would we?
